fields.name: pr.account
fields.description: Login user name for the PR page

fields.name: pr.password
fields.description: Login password for the PR page

fields.name: pr.case_id
fields.description: Case ID. Got from the PR page URL or returned by filler.

fields.name: dashboard.action
fields.description: Action to perform on the dashboard

fields.name: pr.program
fields.description: Program under which you are applying

Ecnomic: Home Child Care Provider Pilot: Direct to permanent residence category
Home Support Worker Pilot: Gaining experience category
Home Support Worker Pilot: Direct to permanent residence category
Family: Adopted child/Child to be adopted in Canada
Refugee: The Private Sponsorship of Refugees (PSR) program
Other: In Canada - Humanitarian and Compassionate Considerations
FV - In-Canada - Humanitarian and Compassionate Considerations
Permanent residence pathways for Hong Kong residents
Ukraine Family Reunification Public Policy QC

fields.name: pr.subcategory
options: Spouse or common-law partner in Canada class

fields.name: pr.situation
fields.description: Program under which you are applying when creaing a new application
options: PR Card Renewal and PR Travel Document

fields.name: personal.accompany
fields.description: Will this dependant accompany the principal applicant to Canada?

fields.name: personal.other_name
fields.description: Have you ever used any other name (e.g. nickname, maiden name, alias, etc.)?

fields.name: personal.current_residence.other_reason
fields.description: If immigration status is 'other', provide details below

fields.name: personal.current_residence.canada
fields.description: Is your current country of residence Canada?

fields.name: personal.current_residence.canada.date
fields.description: Date of your last entry to Canada

fields.name: personal.current_residence.canada.place
fields.description: Place of your last entry to Canada

fields.name: personal.previous_residence
fields.description: during the past five years, have you lived in any country other than your country of citizenship or your current country of residence (indicated above) for more than six months?

fields.name: personal.previous_residence.details1
fields.description: If immigration status is 'other', provide details below

fields.name: personal.previous_residence2
fields.description: Do you have second previous residence?

fields.name: personal.previous_residence.details2
fields.description: If immigration status is 'other', provide details below

fields.name: personal.marital.previous
fields.description: Have you been previously married or in a common-law relationship?

fields.name: personal.marital.previous.dob
fields.description: Date of birth of previous spouse (YYYY/MM/DD)

fields.name: dependants
fields.description: Spouse, partner or dependant(s) profiles. Relationship includes: 'Adopted Child', 'Child', 'Common-Law Partner', 'Grandchild', 'Other', 'Spouse', 'Step-Child', 'Step-Grandchild', 'Parent', 'Adoptive Parent'

fields.name: application.province
fields.description: Province plan to live in Canada

fields.name: application.city
fields.description: City plan to live in Canada

fields.name: contact.address.province
fields.description: Province. US/Canada has corresponding list, other countries disabled

fields.name: contact.address.district
fields.description: District. Disabled for US/Canada, enabled for other countries

fields.name: contact.address.residential.province
fields.description: Province. US/Canada has corresponding list, other countries disabled

fields.name: contact.address.residential.district
fields.description: District. Disabled for US/Canada, enabled for other countries

fields.name: contact.address.residential.same
fields.description: Residential address same as mailing address?

fields.name: contact.email.same
fields.description: Do you want us to contact you using the email address used for this account?

fields.name: passport
fields.description: Do you have a valid passport/travel document?

fields.name: passport.country
fields.description: Country of issue. Format is 3 letter code followed by country name in brackets. e.g. CHN (China)

fields.name: national_id
fields.description: Do you have a national identity document?

fields.name: education.years
fields.description: Number of years of education in total

fields.name: language.communicate
fields.description: Are you able to communicate in English and/or French?

fields.name: language.communicate.which_one
fields.description: In which language are you most at ease?

fields.name: language.test
fields.description: Have you taken a test from a designated testing agency to assess your English or French skills?

fields.name: family_infos
fields.description: Family information list. Included fields see below

fields.name: family.applicant.address
fields.description: Provide address below. Give city/town and country or territory (maximum 80 characters)

fields.name: family.spouse.address
fields.description: Provide address below. Give city/town and country or territory (maximum 80 characters)

fields.name: family.mother.address
fields.description: Provide address below. Give city/town and country or territory (maximum 80 characters)

fields.name: family.father.address
fields.description: Provide address below. Give city/town and country or territory (maximum 80 characters)

fields.name: family.children
fields.description: Section B Children information list. Included fields see below

fields.name: family.siblings
fields.description: Section C Siblings information list. Included fields are similar to children information list.

fields.name: backgrounds
fields.description: Background information list. Included fields see below

fields.name: background.questionnaire.convicted_canada
fields.description: been convicted of a crime or offence in Canada for which a pardon has not been granted under the Criminal Records Act of Canada?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.convicted_outside
fields.description: been convicted of or are currently charged with, on trial for, or party to a crime or offence, or subject of any criminal proceedings in any other country or territory?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.claimed_refugee
fields.description: made previous claims for refugee protection in Canada or at a Canadian visa office abroad, in any other country(ies) or territory(ies), or with the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.refused_refugee
fields.description: been refused refugee status, an immigrant or permanent resident visa (including a Certificat de Sélection du Québec [CSQ] or application to the Provincial Nominee Program) or a visitor or temporary resident visa, for Canada or any other country or territory?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.ordered_to_leave
fields.description: been refused admission to, or ordered to leave, Canada or any other country or territory?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.war_criminal
fields.description: been involved in an act of genocide, in a war crime or in the commission of a crime against humanity?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.committed_violence
fields.description: used, planned or advocated the use of armed struggle or violence to reach political, religious or social objectives?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.associated_violent_group
fields.description: been associated with a group that used, uses, or advocated or advocates the use of armed struggle or violence to reach political, religious or social objectives?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.member_of_criminal
fields.description: been a member of an organization that is or was engaged in an activity that is part of a pattern of criminal activity?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.detained
fields.description: been detained, incarcerated or put in jail?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.mental_disorder
fields.description: had any serious disease or physical or mental disorder?

fields.name: background.questionnaire.details
fields.description: If your answer to any of these questions is yes, please provide details below (maximum 679 characters):

fields.name: background.education.elementary_years
fields.description: Number of years of elementary/primary school

fields.name: background.education.secondary_years
fields.description: Number of years of secondary/high school

fields.name: background.education.other_school_years
fields.description: Number of years of trade school or other post-secondary school

fields.name: background.education.details
fields.description: Give full details of all the secondary and post-secondary education(including university, college and apprenticeship training) you have had.

fields.name: background.history
fields.description: History list. Included fields see below

fields.name: background.memberships
fields.description: What organizations have you supported, been a member of or been associated with?

fields.name: background.government_positions
fields.description: Have you ever held any government positions?

fields.name: background.military_services
fields.description: Have you ever served in the military?

fields.name: background.addresses.current_from
fields.description: When did you start living at your current address?

fields.name: background.addresses
fields.description: List all addresses where you have lived in the past 10 years or since your 18th birthday if it was less than 10 years ago. Do not use P.O. box addresses.

fields.name: travels.applicant.no_travel
fields.description: If you did not travel outside of your country during this period, check this

fields.name: travels.applicant.trips
fields.description: List all trips you have taken outside of your country of origin or of residence in the last 10 years (or since your 18th birthday if this was less than 10 years ago). Include all trips: tourism, business, training, etc.

fields.name: travels.spouse.no_travel
fields.description: If you did not travel outside of your country during this period, check this

fields.name: travels.spouse.trips
fields.description: List all trips you have taken outside of your country of origin or of residence in the last 10 years (or since your 18th birthday if this was less than 10 years ago). Include all trips: tourism, business, training, etc.

fields.name: travels.children.no_travel
fields.description: If you did not travel outside of your country during this period, check this

fields.name: travels.children.trips
fields.description: List all trips you have taken outside of your country of origin or of residence in the last 10 years (or since your 18th birthday if this was less than 10 years ago). Include all trips: tourism, business, training, etc.

fields.name: documents.imm0008
fields.description: IMM 0008 Schedule 4: Economic Classes - Provincial Nominees

fields.name: documents.imm5476
fields.description: IMM 5476 Use of a Representative (If Applicable)

fields.name: documents.imm5690
fields.description: IMM 5690 Document Checklist: Provincial Nominee Program and Quebec Skilled Workers

fields.name: prc.case_id
fields.description: PRC case ID. Got from the PR page URL or returned by filler.

fields.name: prc.urgent
fields.description: PRC: Is your PR card request urgent?

fields.name: prc.urgent.reason
options: Work related to your current job
Serious illness of a family member
You are in a crisis, emergency, or vulnerable situation

fields.name: prc.urgent.documents
fields.description: PRC: list of supporting document for urgency

fields.name: prc.situation
options: Replace a lost, stolen or damaged PR card
Apply for a PRTD as I do not have a valid PR Card
Apply for a PRTD as my PR Card was lost, stolen or damaged

fields.name: prc.pr_date
fields.description: PRC: Date you became a PR in Canada

fields.name: prc.pr_city
fields.description: PRC: City you became a PR in Canada

fields.name: prc.pr_province
fields.description: PRC: Province you became a PR in Canada

fields.name: prc.personal.current_family_name
fields.description: PRC: Current family name if different from above (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.current_given_name
fields.description: PRC: Current given name if different from above (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.other_citizenships
fields.description: list countries of citizenship if you have more than one

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.po_box
fields.description: Mailing address PO Box if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.apartment
fields.description: Mailing address apartment if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.street_no
fields.description: Mailing address street number if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.street_name
fields.description: Mailing address street name if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.city
fields.description: Mailing address city if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.postal_code
fields.description: Mailing address postal code if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.mailing.province
fields.description: Mailing address province if different with residential (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.primary_telephone.country_code
fields.description: Primary telephone country code (skip if NA)

fields.name: prc.personal.alternative_telephone.country_code
fields.description: Alternative telephone country code (skip if NA) (optional)

fields.name: prc.personal.contact.same
fields.description: Would you like us to contact you using the email address provided for this account?

fields.name: prc.personal.contact.email
fields.description: provide the email address we can use to contact you

fields.name: prc.personal.marital.date
fields.description: Date of marriage or common-law relationship

fields.name: prc.history.removal_order
fields.description: Have you ever been issued a removal order from Canada?

fields.name: prc.history.inadmissibility_report
fields.description: Has an immigration officer ever issued you an inadmissibility report, under subsection 44(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act?

fields.name: prc.history.lost_status
fields.description: Have you ever lost your status as a PR of Canada?

fields.name: prc.history.submitted_appeal
fields.description: Have you ever submitted an appeal to the Immigration Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board against a decision on the residence obligation?

fields.name: prc.history.travel_document_issued
fields.description: Have you ever been issued a travel document?

fields.name: prc.history.pr_travel_document_issued
fields.description: Have you ever been issued a PR travel document?

fields.name: prc.history.additional_details
fields.description: If you answered yes to any of the above questions, provide details (Maximum characters: 1500)

fields.name: prc.history.addresses
fields.description: List your address history for the past five (5) years or if you became a PR less than five (5) years ago, your address history since becoming a PR. List your activities in order from the most recent to the oldest.

fields.name: prc.history.work_educations
fields.description: Your work and educational history for the past five (5) years or if you became a PR less than five (5) years ago, your work and educational history since becoming a PR.

fields.name: prc.residency_obligation.been_outside
fields.description: Have you travelled or lived outside Canada in the past five (5) years?

fields.name: prc.residency_obligation.employed
fields.description: Have you been employed on a full-time basis by a Canadian business outside Canada or in the federal public administration or the public service of a province, while you were absent from Canada?

fields.name: prc.residency_obligation.accompany_citizen
fields.description: Have you been accompanying a Canadian citizen who is your spouse or common-law partner or, in the case of a child, your parent, while you were absent from Canada?

fields.name: prc.residency_obligation.accompany_pr
fields.description: Have you been accompanying a PR who is your spouse or common-law partner or, in the case of a child, your parent, and who is employed on a full-time basis by a Canadian business outside Canada or in the federal public administration or the public service of a province, while you were absent from Canada?

description.overall: You must provide all your absences from Canada during the past five (5) years or since becoming a PR if less than five (5) years ago. List your absences from the most recent to the oldest.
description.reason: Reason for absence. A, B, C or Other
